Key Match Events: Freddie Freeman homered for the second straight night
Yoshinobu Yamamoto allowed one hit over 6â…“ innings
Teoscar Hernandez also went deep for the Dodgers
Shohei Ohtani got hurt on a feetfirst slide when he was caught stealing second base to end the seventh inning
Alex Vesia relieved with the bases loaded and retired pinch-hitter Jose Trevino on a first-pitch flyout for the save
Post-Match Reflections: Ohtani had a partially dislocated left shoulder and the strength and range of motion were good
Yamamoto gave the Dodgers a great start and gave the team an early lead
Freeman expressed gratitude for the team's performance and his own health status
Judge went 0 for 4 with three strikeouts and is hitting.150 with six RBIs and 19 strikeouts in 40 postseason at-bats
Miscellaneous Highlights: Yamamoto's performance was his finest since returning from a strain of his rotator cuff
Hernandez had three homers and nine RBIs over a three-game series
Freeman homered in four straight Series games
All three Dodgers homers came on fastballs from Rodon
Los Angeles took a 2-0 Series lead for the first time since 1988
The Yankees are 0-2 for the first time since 2001
